  SB030Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesCan be used for ORIF, wherever indicated. Can not be used as an Add - on package
  SB032Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.
  SB032Bhttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesSurgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.

  SC076Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesIf the Hospital choses Pediatric Port in a pt. aged more than 14 years. Then it should be audited
  SE012Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesThe package is inclusive of Eye Bank processing fee
  SE012Bhttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesThis is a special follow up package, as in Corneal graft surgery, a follow up at 1 week is required. At this time, the surgeon has to examine and then prescribe medicine for next one month. The medicine for 1 month has to be given at the time of booking this package. A signed reciept from the pt. is an essential document
  SE018Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesTo be done only after a prior scleral buckling surgery history
  SE022Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesCan be booked only after 1 year of cataract surgery
  SE025Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesCan be booked as a complication of cataract surgery atleast 15 days after discharge
  SE029Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesThe procedure is done only once per eye and not repeated
  SE029Bhttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codes1. Claim to be raised after all 3 sittings have been done per eye. 2. The interval between subsequent sittings is atleast 1 week.
  SE033Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesPre-auth to be raised only in cases which have a prior history of Vitreoretinal surgery done atleast 3 months ago
  SG097Ahttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesCan be booked only after 15 days of Ileostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma. The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: Ileostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months
  SG097Bhttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesCan be booked only after 15 days of Colostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma. The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: colostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months

  SU060Bhttp://hcxprotocol.io/codes/informational-messages-codesClaim for Rs. 15,000 can be raised after 6th Cycle. Remainaing Rs. 15,000 can be claimed after 12th Cycle

Surgical Management for Type III & IV Rockwood to be decided by the surgeon on case to case basis
Type V & VI to be taken up for Surgery straight away
In case Type I or II is booked a Pop Up to be shown "For Rockwood Type I & II - AC Joint injury, experts recommend Medical Management, are you sure you want to do Surgical Correction in this case ?" 
For Hospitals booking Surgical Correction in Type I & Type II cases, Medical Audit will be conducted.

LA for - K Wire & Screw

If the Hospital choses Pediatric Port in a pt. aged more than 14 years. Then it should be audited
The package is inclusive of Eye Bank processing fee

This is a special  follow up package, as in Corneal graft surgery, a follow up at 1 week is required.
At this time, the surgeon has to examine and then prescribe medicine for next one month.
The medicine for 1 month has to be given at the time of booking this package.
A signed reciept from the pt. is an essential document
To be done only after a prior scleral buckling surgery history
Can be booked only after 1 year of cataract surgery
Can be booked as a complication of cataract surgery atleast 15 days after discharge
The procedure is done only once per eye and not repeated

1. Claim to be raised after all 3 sittings have been done per eye.
2. The interval between subsequent sittings is atleast 1 week.
Pre-auth to be raised only in cases which have a prior history of Vitreoretinal surgery done atleast 3 months ago

Can be booked only after 15 days of Ileostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma.
The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: Ileostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months

Can be booked only after 15 days of Colostomy and then every 2 months thereafter till the closure of stoma.
The Hospital has to upload a signed statement from pt. that s/he has received the cosnumables: colostomy - bags, adhesive, clips etc for 2 months
Payment to be made after completion of one month.
Claim to be raised after 6th Cycle

Claim for Rs. 15,000 can be raised after 6th Cycle.
Remainaing Rs. 15,000 can be claimed after 12th Cycle

No payment to be done to the Hospital for this stage
The package can be booked only if the first stage package has been booked prior to this
The package can be booked only if the first stage and / or intermediate stage package has been booked prior to this

Incidence - 5% to 7%
Scrutiny of Hospitals where incidence is more than twice of prescribed limit
